name: The DJ-ROM: Da CD-Extra of Hip-Hop Music
summary: The streets of Night City are full of cool sound materials! Make songs in the studio and play them in the club. This is an electric fighting space with a Hip-Hop taste! The game world realistically portrays the life of authentic DJs with 3D graphics. Hone your heart as a DJ while experiencing various events in the city of freedom, opportunity, demonization & violence!
